author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: What to watch today: Dow set to advance after Tuesday's over 900-point surge fizzled
description: U.S. stock futures point to a gain for the Dow at Wednesday's open after blue chips gave up an over 900-point surge in the prior session.
content: U.S. stock futures were pointing to a gain for the Dow Jones Industrial Average at Wednesday's open. The Dow fell 26 points Tuesday after giving up an over 900-point surge earlier in the session. The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq also closed modestly lower. (CNB… [+5121 chars]
